events.message: I placed an order over two weeks ago, but it still hasn't arrived yet. The tracking link shows no updates for days.
The reported issue has been classified under delivery delay due to keywords indicating shipping problems and no recent tracking updates.
The case has been assigned to delivery support team member Alice Johnson for further assistance regarding the delayed shipment.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m sorry to hear your order has not arrived yet. I will do my best to help you today.
Could you please provide your order number and any tracking details you have so that I can check the shipment status for you?
Sure, my order number is 9876543210. The tracking number is TRK123456789. The last update was from a week ago at the distribution center.
I've contacted the shipping company to investigate the delay. Meanwhile, I can offer a shipping refund or resend your order if not delivered within 3 days.
Thank you for the quick response. I’d prefer to wait for the current shipment for three more days before considering a resend.
The tracking has been updated and your package is out for delivery today. We appreciate your patience and apologize for the delay.
Just checking in to ensure you received your order and that everything was satisfactory. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Since your delivery issue has been resolved and no further action is required, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
